about_the_game:
A beer this big will make any beer drinker happy! And sick too, probably. Lifting the bottle up is also a great bicep exercise!

Gives Jorma a bigger bottle of beer to drink instead of his regular one.

content_descriptors.notes:
-Alcohol misuse. Game does not encourage to it though.
-Some violence, including shooting with firearms and some self-harm.

detailed_description:
A beer this big will make any beer drinker happy! And sick too, probably. Lifting the bottle up is also a great bicep exercise!

Gives Jorma a bigger bottle of beer to drink instead of his regular one.
name: The Real Man Summer Championship 2019 - 1 Gallon XXXL Beer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Win 7/8.1/10 (64Bit)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz dual core processor or higher.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 560 GTX or Radeon R7 260x series or higher.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10 (64Bit)
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz multi core processor or higher.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 760 GTX or Radeon R9 280X series or higher.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: A beer this big will make any beer drinker happy! And sick too, probably. Lifting the bottle up is also a great bicep exercise!
